warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Extend arms to the sides and make small circles, gradually increasing the size. Perform 2 sets of 30 seconds each direction.

warmup_exercises.setup_notes: Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Alternate between arching your back (cow) and rounding it (cat). Perform 2 sets of 10 reps.

warmup_exercises.setup_notes: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and hands on hips.
warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Twist your torso to the left and right, keeping your hips stable. Perform 2 sets of 15 reps each side.

exercises.setup: Sit down at a lat pull-down machine and adjust the knee pad to fit snugly against your thighs.
execution: 1. Grip the bar with a wide grip, palms facing forward.
2. Pull the bar down towards your upper chest while keeping your back straight.
3. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom of the movement.
4. Slowly return the bar to the starting position, maintaining control.
exercises.weight: Select a weight where the last 2-3 reps feel challenging but still allow you to maintain proper form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at the lat pull-down machine and use a neutral grip attachment.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Grip the handles with palms facing each other.
2. Pull the handles down towards your chest, keeping elbows close to your body.
3. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Choose a weight that allows you to perform 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on engaging your lats throughout the movement and avoid using momentum.

exercises.setup: Use a chest-supported row machine or incline bench.
execution: 1. Lie face down on the bench with your chest supported.
2. Grip the handles or dumbbells with palms facing down.
3. Pull the weight towards your chest, keeping elbows close to your body.
4. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top.
5. Slowly lower the weight back to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Use a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at a cable row machine with feet braced against the platform.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Grip the handle with both hands.
2. Pull the handle towards your abdomen, keeping your back straight.
3. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to perform 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Keep your chest pressed against the pad to isolate your back muscles effectively.

exercises.setup: Sit at a cable row machine with feet braced against the platform.
execution: 1. Grip the handle with both hands.
2. Pull the handle towards your abdomen, keeping your back straight.
3. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at the cable row machine and attach a wide grip bar.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Grip the bar with a wide grip, palms facing down.
2. Pull the bar towards your chest, keeping elbows wide.
3. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to perform 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on a full range of motion to maximize muscle engagement.
